Text: In other news, Vice Chairman Jay S. Benet sold 21,972 shares of Travelers Companies stock in a transaction that occurred on Friday, August 23rd. The shares were sold at an average price of $146.59, for a total value of $3,220,875.48. Following the transaction, the insider now owns 94,588 shares of the company's stock, valued at $13,865,654.92.
